gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ,
or
VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ
or
‘for’
.

sense.def:
To buy something
pomeni nekaj pridobiti tako, da plačamo z denarjem.

seg.quote: She could not afford to buy it.
Let me buy you a drink.
Many people have their cars bought for them by their firm.

sense.def:
Če človek reče, da je nekaj
a good buy
, hoče povedati, da je dobre kakovosti in ima nizko ceno.

seg.quote: Other good buys include cameras and toys.

sense.def:
To buy someone out
pomeni od nekoga kupiti njegov delež pri nečem, kar sta imela prej v skupni lasti.

seg.quote: He sold off the shops to buy out his partner.

sense.def:
To buy up land or property
pomeni kupiti zemljo ali posest v velikih količinah ali vso, kar je je na voljo.
